review: We got what we expected.  Thank you.
author: Shlomo Tuchband

review: The best option, by far, to look my series and movies, youtube videos, or netflix on the tv. It can't be more easy to install and use:I sit on the couch, select the media from my android (I strongly recommend the BubbleUPnP app to stream local media -i.e your NAS-) and that's all!
author: Camillo

review: Good for streaming off internet, but not too great for streaming local contents, breaks
author: Adeniji Olusegun Samuel

review: I love it had some issues with wifi interference right away but once I got those cleared up it connects consistently now.  It was interfering with my wireless headphones base station.
author: Brian

review: Very easy to use. I had to buy one for my parents, Now I know what to give to my family in Christmas!
author: Alvaro M

review: Not a good product at all.  Don't waste your money.  It projects your screen but with a lag time.  It's impossible to watch netflix, movies, or anything for that matter.  Also after projecting for a short period of time, the screen will freeze and no longer protect at all.  I only used it 3 times since I bought it, and it failed every time.  I'll stick with dealing with cords and wires than this garbage.
author: Kim
